snippet: Aleksei A. Navalny, the Russian opposition leader, said Tuesday that he had defied his house arrest by walking to his local store to buy milk.
abstract: Russian opposition leader Aleksei A Navalny says on his blog he ignored his house arrest and walked to local store, only to be stopped by three men who walked him back to his home.
lead_paragraph: Aleksei A. Navalny, the Russian opposition leader, said Tuesday that he had defied his house arrest by walking to his local store to buy milk.
